content:
diff --git a/src/_pytest/capture.py b/src/_pytest/capture.py
index 25eab7fdf..1fdaa3e67 100644
--- a/src/_pytest/capture.py
+++ b/src/_pytest/capture.py
@@ -447,6 +447,15 @@ class EncodedFile(object):
         """Ensure that file.name is a string."""
         return repr(self.buffer)

+    @property
+    def mode(self):
+        """Return a text-mode-like mode string (hide binary flag) to avoid
+        consumers mistaking this stream for accepting bytes.
+        """
+        m = getattr(self.buffer, "mode", "")
+        # advertise text-mode: remove binary flag if present
+        return m.replace("b", "")
+
     def __getattr__(self, name):
         return getattr(object.__getattribute__(self, "buffer"), name)
